channel.title: Multiplayer Crash - dm_lambdabunker
channel.description: Game crashed to desktop with no error message. I think I was mid-firefight when it happened, but not sure. Don't remember much other than the map. This has happened to me a few times during multiplayer, seemingly (though probably not) at random. Will send more dumps as they happen. Thanks. crash_bms.exe_20150601214037_1.zip (44.3 KB)
